defects_found.description: Test file truncated - incomplete test implementation for boolean edge cases
defects_found.evidence: File tests/test_sum_numbers.py is incomplete. The test class TestSumNumbersTypeValidation ends abruptly at line 'def test_sum_with_' without completing the test method. This causes a SyntaxError when pytest attempts to parse the file.

defects_found.description: Missing test cases for boolean edge case handling as specified in design
defects_found.evidence: Design specification SU-004 (SumNumbersEdgeCaseHandler) explicitly requires: 'add explicit check isinstance(a, bool) or isinstance(b, bool) and raise TypeError if booleans are passed'. The test file is truncated before completing the boolean rejection tests (test_sum_with_true_first_parameter, test_sum_with_true_second_parameter, test_sum_with_false_first_parameter, test_sum_with_false_second_parameter). These critical edge case tests are missing from the generated test suite.
